eu.bavenir.ogwapi.restapi.services

Class EventsEid

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.resource.Resource
      • org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
        • eu.bavenir.ogwapi.restapi.services.EventsEid

  • public class EventsEid
extends org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
    This class implements a ServerResource interface for following Gateway API calls: URL: [server]:[port]/api/events/{eid} METHODS: POST, PUT, DELETE SPECIFICATION: @see Gateway API ATTRIBUTES: eid - Alpha numerical Event identifier (as in object description) (e.g. fullyCharged).
    Author:
    sulfo

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        @Post(value="json")
public org.restlet.representation.Representation accept(org.restlet.representation.Representation entity)
        Used by an Agent/Adapter, that is capable of generating events and is willing to send these events to subscribed objects. A call to this end point activates the channel – from that moment, other objects in the network are able to subscribe for receiving those messages.
        Parameters:
        entity - Optional JSON with parameters.
        Returns:
        statusMessage StatusMessage with the result of the operation.

      • store

        @Put(value="json")
public org.restlet.representation.Representation store(org.restlet.representation.Representation entity)
        Used by an Agent/Adapter that is capable of generating events, to send an event to all subscribed objects on the network.
        Parameters:
        entity - JSON with the event.
        Returns:
        statusMessage StatusMessage with the result of the operation.

      • remove

        @Delete
public org.restlet.representation.Representation remove(org.restlet.representation.Representation entity)
        Used by an Agent/Adapter that is capable of generating events to de-activate an event channel. This will prohibit any other new objects to subscribe to that channel, and the objects that are already subscribed are notified and removed from subscription list.
        Returns:
        statusMessage StatusMessage with the result of the operation.

      • getRequestBody

        private java.lang.String getRequestBody(org.restlet.representation.Representation entity,
                                        java.util.logging.Logger logger)
        Retrieves a request body.
        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to extract the body from.
        logger - Logger.
        Returns:
        Text representation of the body.
